name: Five Nights At Freddy's 4 Android VR
name_original: Five Nights At Freddy's 4 Android VR
description:
Minimum system requirements:

  • Android 4.4
  • Support for gyroscope in the phone.
  • Screen parameters (optimal accounting models, diagonal from 5.5 inches)
  • Disk space: 400 MB or greater space

Five Nights at Freddy's 4 is a point-and-click survival horror game published by indie developer Scott Cawthon, the fourth game in the Five Nights at Freddy's series. The game shows the very first events in the FNaF universe.

In this last chapter of the Five Nights at Freddy's original story, you must once again defend yourself against Freddy Fazbear, Chica, Bonnie, Foxy, and even worse things that lurk in the shadows.

You have only a flashlight to protect yourself. It will scare away things that may be creeping at the far end of the hallways, but be careful, and listen. If something has crept too close, then shining lights in its eyes will be your end.

Version 6.9.10

Tweaked the volume of the animatronics ' footsteps. Added the breath of the animatronics. Changed the speed of Freddie disappearing when they are looked at. Most likely, the appearance animation will be improved in the next update.
